import React, { PureComponent } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export class Welcome extends PureComponent { state = { mobile: '', isWhatsapp: '', } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() var phone = this.state.mobile } handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() var phone = this.state.mobile axios .post(`http://13.59.57.74:5000/api/auth/register`, { phone }) .then((res) => { console.log('res') console.log(res) console.log(res.data) let input = {} input['mobile'] = '' input['isWhatsapp'] = '' this.setState({ input: input }) alert('OTP is Sent.') }) } render() { return (

Sign In to BKS MyGold

console.log('clicked')} /> Send Whatsapp Notication

) } } export default Welcome
